title: Breaking Hospital Organizational Boundaries and Expanding Learning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: A program for healthcare administrators/leaders to strengthen expansive learning capabilities through the development of inter-organizational collaboration tools and co-creation of boundary objects.

learning_goals: Develop at least one collaborative assessment tool that breaks down departmental boundaries within a hospital
Explain how to design knowledge-sharing and collaboration processes within an organization using boundary objects
Apply learned extended learning strategies to real work environments to derive sustainable organizational change cases within three months

resources: Whiteboard and Post-it Notes (for Group Activities)
Smartphone-Based Collaboration App (QR Code Integration Tool)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
